title: Make Your Everyday Health and Well-being a Priority
body: Now that COVID-19 treatment and vaccination is well underway, we cordially invite you to reconnect with local Appalachian Regional Healthcare hospital and clinics.If you put your healthcare on the back burner during the pandemic, •             Visiting your Primary Care Provider•             Scheduling your annual screenings•             Updating and renewing your medications•             Creating a plan for improved healthRemember, problems ignored become bigger problems later.For more information visit:
